description: Configure ball results logic for efficient post-processing. Creates lightweight snapshots of ball geometries and selected attributes at different time instances. IMPORTANT: Ball result files do NOT replace PFC model state files and should not be used to continue cycling. Use with model results command to control when/how result files are created and imported.

keywords.name: active
keywords.description: Enable (true) or disable (false) ball result creation

keywords.name: add-attribute
keywords.description: Add ball attribute to be recorded in results. Use 'group' and 'extra' keywords for groups and extra variables. See ball attribute command for available attributes.

keywords.name: remove-attribute
keywords.description: Remove ball attribute from results recording. Use 'group' and 'extra' keywords for groups and extra variables.

examples.command: ball results add-attribute velocity active true
examples.description: Enable results and record ball velocity

examples.command: ball results add-attribute group add-attribute extra
examples.description: Record group assignments and extra variables

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: itasca.command('ball results ...') - Python SDK does not provide results configuration
